Deadly_Cut.help: You perform a quick slash with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's chance to hit.
Deadly_Cut.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Deadly_Bolt.help: You launch a blast of death energy at a target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers reduced movement and attack speeds.
Deadly_Bolt.targetHelp: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Deadly_Blast.help: You fire a powerful blast of death energy at a single target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers a reduced chance to hit.
Deadly_Blast.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Deadly_Hack.help: You perform a forceful hack with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's movement and attack speeds.
Deadly_Hack.targetHelp: Your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Deadly_Circle.help: You slash at multiple targets around you with your death infused weapon, striking them for negative energy and cold damage. Affected targets also suffer a reduction in their defenses.
Deadly_Circle.shortHelp: Melee (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Negative Energy/Cold), -DEF (Foe, All)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Terrifying_Stare.help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.
Terrifying_Stare.targetHelp: You are terrified and your chance to hit has been reduced.

Boon_of_Death.help: You channel death energy through yourself to a targeted foe. Boon of Death drains life energy from the target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe suffers cold damage and a reduction in their damage potential, while you and your nearby allies are healed.
Boon_of_Death.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Deaths_Embrace.help: You focus death energy on a single target, chilling the air so massively that the target is caught in a block of ice. The affected foe suffers cold damage and negative energy damage over time. The target also suffers reductions in their movement and attack speeds.
Deaths_Embrace.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Negative Energy, DoT), Hold (Foe), -Speed (Foe, All), -Rech (Foe)
Deaths_Embrace.targetHelp: You are held in place and suffering negative energy damage over time. Additionally, your movement and attack speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
